cbccore.motors.statemotors
Interface IBlockingAdvancedStateMotor

All Superinterfaces:
IAdvancedStateMotor, IStateMotor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBlockingAdvancedStateMotor, CoefficientBlockingAdvancedStateMotor, ComposedBlockingAdvancedStateMotor, Motor, OffsetBlockingAdvancedStateMotor, PivotingWheel, RestorePointMotor, Servo, Wheel, Wheel
public interface IBlockingAdvancedStateMotor
extends IAdvancedStateMotor

Implementation note: When using versions of the functions defined in IAdvancedStateMotor, the default behavior should be non-blocking.

Author:
Benjamin Woodruff
